Articles.Content:
I don't know you at all, but we all have that one thing in common.

Merry Christmas from me and my family to all of you!

Thank you, Viktor!

Best wishes to you and yours!

-Slashy
Merry Christmas to all the members of this great comunity! (this includes mods and devs of course)
Merry Christmas to all. May our thoughts also be with those (both Human and Kerbal) who can't be home at this time of year.
